_header: I am not he that you would fain see

BodDig205.Transcription:
I am nott he þat yow wolde fayne seebutt I am he þat yow
                    leyst rest byBetter hyt the thowryth to be lyste by rest then the
                    throwyth to be spoke all way out cest
BodDig205.Note: Contains corrections; possibly an author’s holograph.
